comments: Awesome teacher with a warm heart

WARNING: Do NOT listen to the comments before this. Prof. Weinroth is a terrible professor; her lectures are completely and totally disorganized, boring and overall lacking any sort of substance. I\'m a 4.0 student and got an A- in this class despite doing an obscene amount of work! She is VERY unclear about her requirements - impossible to get an A

Orna is great, she\'s really approchable, and willing to teach you everything she knows if you\'re willing to listen. Pretty much knows everything about art and history. She\'ll take you to really fun events, and all you have to do is write three reviews, blog entries, and do a group project at the end. Will help you with reviews if you have trouble.

Orna clearly knows what shes talking about but she\'s not too good at teaching. The class is an easy A, the only requirements really are attendance and blog entries, as opposed to other teachers who make you write a 10 page paper at the end. She\'s very disorganized and unclear about some of the assignments.

I LOVED Professor Weinroth. Granted I am biased in liking the arts very much but I feel like she is a genuinely brilliant and intellectual person and has much to offer to her students. She may not be the best organized Professor but she radiates intellect, you can learn much from her.

Orna is a great Hebrew teacher, she makes it very easy to understand the language. She is also very willing to help you and answer any and every question that you may have. Orna is YAFEH MEOD!! I HIGHLY recommend her as a teacher!!
